ranked_signals.title: US EPA to Rescind 2009 Endangerment Finding on Greenhouse Gas Emissions
ranked_signals.rationale: Rescinding the legal foundation for all federal climate regulation represents a paradigm-shifting policy reversal with global ripple effects on climate governance, international agreements, and energy markets.

ranked_signals.title: Stanford Light-Based Breakthrough Could Enable Million-Qubit Quantum Computers
ranked_signals.rationale: Practical path to million-qubit quantum systems would transform drug discovery, materials science, cryptography, and logistics optimization across multiple industries.

ranked_signals.title: UNCTAD: Trade Fragmentation into New Blocs as US Retreats
ranked_signals.rationale: Structural fragmentation of the global trading system into competing blocs represents a fundamental shift in the post-WWII economic order, affecting supply chains, investment flows, and geopolitical alliances.

ranked_signals.title: Global Energy Transition Investment Hits $2.3T; Renewables to Overtake Coal
ranked_signals.rationale: Renewables overtaking coal as the largest power generation source marks a historical inflection point in the global energy system, with cascading effects on geopolitics, employment, and climate trajectories.

ranked_signals.title: Quantum Error Correction Breakthrough: Computing While Fixing Errors
ranked_signals.rationale: Solving the error correction bottleneck while maintaining computation is a prerequisite for commercially viable quantum computing.

ranked_signals.title: EU AI Act Full Application August 2026; US States Advance Parallel Frameworks
ranked_signals.rationale: The world's most comprehensive AI regulation becoming fully applicable creates a 'Brussels Effect' benchmark for global AI governance.

ranked_signals.title: DeepMind Launches Real-Time World Model; World Labs Releases Marble
ranked_signals.rationale: World models represent the next frontier in AI capabilities, enabling physical reasoning and simulation that could accelerate robotics and autonomous systems.

ranked_signals.title: IPBES: Biodiversity Decline Is Systemic Risk to Global Economic Stability
ranked_signals.rationale: Reframing biodiversity loss as systemic economic risk (not just environmental issue) could trigger financial regulatory action and investment portfolio reassessment.

ranked_signals.title: Iran Protests Spread to All 31 Provinces; New US Sanctions
ranked_signals.rationale: Nationwide protests with internet blackout represent potential regime instability with implications for Middle East geopolitics, energy markets, and nuclear proliferation.

ranked_signals.title: WFP: 20% Increase in Acute Food Insecurity; 60% Production in 5 Countries
ranked_signals.rationale: Rising food insecurity combined with extreme geographic concentration of food production creates cascading vulnerability to climate shocks, conflict, and trade disruptions.

ranked_signals.title: AI Shifts from Scaling to Practical Implementation
ranked_signals.rationale: Industry-wide pivot from scale-focused AI development to practical deployment signals maturation of the AI market.

ranked_signals.title: Conduent Breach Exposes 25M Americans; BridgePay Ransomware
ranked_signals.rationale: Scale of government contractor breach (25M SSN/health records) and payment infrastructure attack (forcing cash-only) highlight critical infrastructure vulnerability.

ranked_signals.title: AI Analyzes Blood Cells More Accurately Than Human Experts
ranked_signals.rationale: AI surpassing human expert accuracy in medical diagnostics accelerates the path to AI-augmented healthcare.

ranked_signals.title: US Secret Climate Panel Ruled Unlawful; 5 Offshore Wind Projects Resume
ranked_signals.rationale: Judicial checks on executive climate policy overreach, combined with offshore wind construction resumption, indicate resilience of energy transition despite political headwinds.

ranked_signals.title: ILO: Global Jobs Gap to Reach 408 Million in 2026
ranked_signals.rationale: 408M global jobs gap underscores structural employment challenges that compound with automation and demographic shifts.
